  16. ‌let gen_annot = ref false
  17. ‌let gen_ml = ref false
  18. ‌let print_info_arg = ref false
  19. ‌let target_filename = ref None
  20. ‌let save_cmt_info = ref false

  22. ‌let arg_list = Arg.align [
  23.   "-o", Arg.String (fun s -> target_filename := Some s),
  24.     "<file> Dump to file <file> (or stdout if -)";
  25.   "-annot", Arg.Set gen_annot,
  26.     " Generate the corresponding .annot file";
  27.   "-save-cmt-info", Arg.Set save_cmt_info,
  28.     " Encapsulate additional cmt information in annotations";
  29.   "-src", Arg.Set gen_ml,
  30.     " Convert .cmt or .cmti back to source code (without comments)";
  31.   "-info", Arg.Set print_info_arg, " : print information on the file";
  32.   "-args", Arg.Expand Arg.read_arg,
  33.     "<file> Read additional newline separated command line arguments \n\
  34.     \      from <file>";
  35.   "-args0", Arg.Expand Arg.read_arg0,
  36.     "<file> Read additional NUL separated command line arguments from \n\
  37.     \      <file>";
  38.   "-I", Arg.String (fun s ->
  39.     Clflags.include_dirs := s :: !Clflags.include_dirs),
  40.     "<dir> Add <dir> to the list of include directories";
  41.   ]

  43. let arg_usage =
  44.   "ocamlcmt [OPTIONS] FILE.cmt : read FILE.cmt and print related information"

  46. let dummy_crc = String.make 32 '-'

  48. let print_info cmt =
  49.   let oc = match !target_filename with
  50.     | None -> stdout
  51.     | Some filename -> open_out filename
  52.   in
  53. ‌  let open Cmt_format in
  54.   Printf.fprintf oc "module name: %s\n" cmt.cmt_modname;
  55.   begin match cmt.cmt_annots with
  56.     Packed (_, list) ->
  57.       Printf.fprintf oc "pack: %s\n" (String.concat " " list)
  58.   | Implementation _ -> Printf.fprintf oc "kind: implementation\n"
  59.   | Interface _ -> Printf.fprintf oc "kind: interface\n"
  60.   | Partial_implementation _ ->
  61.     Printf.fprintf oc "kind: implementation with errors\n"
  62.   | Partial_interface _ -> Printf.fprintf oc "kind: interface with errors\n"
  63.   end;
  64.   Printf.fprintf oc "command: %s\n"
  65.     (String.concat " " (Array.to_list cmt.cmt_args));
  66.   begin match cmt.cmt_sourcefile with
  67.     None -> ()
  68.   | Some name ->
  69.     Printf.fprintf oc "sourcefile: %s\n" name;
  70.   end;
  71.   Printf.fprintf oc "build directory: %s\n" cmt.cmt_builddir;
  72.   List.iter (Printf.fprintf oc "load path: %s\n%!") cmt.cmt_loadpath;
  73.   begin
  74.     match cmt.cmt_source_digest with
  75.       None -> ()
  76.     | Some digest ->
  77.       Printf.fprintf oc "source digest: %s\n" (Digest.to_hex digest);
  78.   end;
  79.   begin
  80.     match cmt.cmt_interface_digest with
  81.       None -> ()
  82.     | Some digest ->
  83.       Printf.fprintf oc "interface digest: %s\n" (Digest.to_hex digest);
  84.   end;
  85.   List.iter (fun (name, crco) ->
  86.     let crc =
  87.       match crco with
  88.         None -> dummy_crc
  89.       | Some crc -> Digest.to_hex crc
  90.     in
  91.     Printf.fprintf oc "import: %s %s\n" name crc;
  92.   ) (List.sort compare cmt.cmt_imports);
  93.   Printf.fprintf oc "%!";
  94.   begin match !target_filename with
  95.   | None -> ()
  96.   | Some _ -> close_out oc
  97.   end;
  98.   ()

  100. ‌let generate_ml target_filename filename cmt =
  101.   let (printer, ext) =
  102.     match cmt.Cmt_format.cmt_annots with
  103.       | Cmt_format.Implementation typedtree ->
  104.           (fun ppf -> Pprintast.structure ppf
  105.                                         (Untypeast.untype_structure typedtree)),
  106.           ".ml"
  107.       | Cmt_format.Interface typedtree ->
  108.           (fun ppf -> Pprintast.signature ppf
  109.                                         (Untypeast.untype_signature typedtree)),
  110.           ".mli"
  111.       | _ ->
  112.         Printf.fprintf stderr "File was generated with an error\n%!";
  113.           exit 2
  114.   in
  115.   let target_filename = match target_filename with
  116.       None -> Some (filename ^ ext)
  117.     | Some "-" -> None
  118.     | Some _ -> target_filename
  119.   in
  120.   let oc = match target_filename with
  121.       None -> None
  122.     | Some filename -> Some (open_out filename) in
  123.   let ppf = match oc with
  124.       None -> Format.std_formatter
  125.     | Some oc -> Format.formatter_of_out_channel oc in
  126.   printer ppf;
  127.   Format.pp_print_flush ppf ();
  128.   match oc with
  129.       None -> flush stdout
  130.     | Some oc -> close_out oc

  132. (* Save cmt information as faked annotations, attached to
  133.    Location.none, on top of the .annot file. Only when -save-cmt-info is
  134.    provided to ocaml_cmt.
  135. *)
  136. ‌let record_cmt_info cmt =
  137.   let location_none = {
  138.     Location.none with Location.loc_ghost = false }
  139.   in
  140.   let location_file file = {
  141.     Location.none with
  142.       Location.loc_start = {
  143.         Location.none.Location.loc_start with
  144.           Lexing.pos_fname = file }}
  145.   in
  146.   let record_info name value =
  147.     let ident = Printf.sprintf ".%s" name in
  148.     Stypes.record (Stypes.An_ident (location_none, ident,
  149.                                     Annot.Idef (location_file value)))
  150.   in
  151. ‌  let open Cmt_format in
  152.   List.iter (fun dir -> record_info "include" dir) cmt.cmt_loadpath;
  153.   record_info "chdir" cmt.cmt_builddir;
  154.   (match cmt.cmt_sourcefile with
  155.     None -> () | Some file -> record_info "source" file)

  157. let main () =
  158.   Clflags.annotations := true;

  160.   Arg.parse_expand arg_list  (fun filename ->
  161.     if
  162.       Filename.check_suffix filename ".cmt" ||
  163.         Filename.check_suffix filename ".cmti"
  164.     then begin
  165.       let open Cmt_format in
  166.       Compmisc.init_path ();
  167.       let cmt = read_cmt filename in
  168.       if !gen_annot then begin
  169.         if !save_cmt_info then record_cmt_info cmt;
  170.         let target_filename =
  171.           match !target_filename with
  172.           | None -> Some (filename ^ ".annot")
  173.           | Some "-" -> None
  174.           | Some _ as x -> x
  175.         in
  176.         Envaux.reset_cache ();
  177.         List.iter Load_path.add_dir cmt.cmt_loadpath;
  178.         Cmt2annot.gen_annot target_filename
  179.           ~sourcefile:cmt.cmt_sourcefile
  180.           ~use_summaries:cmt.cmt_use_summaries
  181.           cmt.cmt_annots
  182.       end;
  183.       if !gen_ml then generate_ml !target_filename filename cmt;
  184.       if !print_info_arg || not (!gen_ml || !gen_annot) then print_info cmt;
  185.     end else begin
  186.       Printf.fprintf stderr
  187.                      "Error: the file's extension must be .cmt or .cmti.\n%!";
  188.       Arg.usage arg_list arg_usage
  189.     end
  190.   ) arg_usage

  192. ‌let main () =
  193.   try
  194.     main ()
  195.   with x ->
  196.     Printf.eprintf "Exception in main ()\n%!";
  197.     Location.report_exception Format.err_formatter x;
  198.     Format.fprintf Format.err_formatter "@.";
  199.     exit 2

  201. let _ = main ()
